articles.description: Scotland need to rediscover their fearlessness and resilience if they are to beat Switzerland and revive their Euro 2024 hopes, writes Tom English.

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo didn't mark his record-breaking appearance with a goal against Czech Republic, but for fans and his team-mates he still has an important role to play for Portugal.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: 'He unites all' - why 'symbol' Ronaldo is Portugal's star draw
